meanings.definition: To make a clown of; to turn into a clown.
meanings.sent1: When he put on the oversized shoes and red nose, he beclowns himself.
meanings.sent2: The comedian beclowns himself on stage to make people laugh.
meanings.sent3: The serious professor accidentally beclowns himself by wearing a rainbow wig to class.
meanings.sent4: Her attempt to imitate a famous clown only served to beclown her further.
meanings.sent5: The clumsy waiter's antics beclowned him in front of the entire restaurant.

meanings.definition: To behave or dress in a ridiculous or comical manner.
meanings.sent1: During the costume party, she beclowns herself by wearing a giant banana suit.
meanings.sent2: The group of friends decided to beclown themselves by doing silly dances in public.
meanings.sent3: The cat beclowns itself by trying to wear a tiny hat on its head.
meanings.sent4: The politician's attempt to beclown his opponent backfired and made him look foolish.
meanings.sent5: The actor's exaggerated gestures beclowned him in the eyes of the audience.
